data.message: I have some new ideas, but you finished the album, unless you have a deluxe album, I'll be able to send you the lyrics, but if you have I'll send it to you have a nice day Marshall

replies.message: You think he's gonna take your lyrics ?
Lol😂 he dont need any ghostwritter
Yeah, you know why? Because he already saw my talent as copositor a big hug

I trust in my talent is something that the real artist always has to have high confidence. Do not forget that he also suffered with people doubts about his talent and became the greatest rapper alive, so do not doubt me

I think that you are not an artist, you would not understand nor if I explained, but I sincerely believe in myself, and that is what motivates me always to fight for what I want the path is not easy in music, it is not easy, but You do not trust you, and show potential, will not get anywhere neither one, if I said it's because I know, what I'm saying and Marshall knows too, the way there are many haters who just want to knock you down when you are Trying to climb the steps trying to stabilize making music, but generally no one supports you if you get to talk to an artist like Marshall all ridicule you and try to say that you have no potential without even seeing your work
Cristiano drugs kicked you hard af
Tomi De Artiagoitia Did you read what I wrote or will you be cursing me?

Tomi De Artiagoitia And for you to have an idea I have never used drugs, music is my vice, and my work then respect the people you do not know, because it might be that you choose my job someday and pay for what you said today, the world gives Turns, and in these turns that life gives, is that you lose yourself
I just said he dosnt need any ghost writter.

With him
Roy Chessell Hanes Nsoor
I like that guy
Cristiano De Borba Pereira add me lets have a convo.
Sean Mathers  I'm a pro since 2012, I'm not a ghostwriter.
7-1 brazuca

Him
Isak Curtis
Mike Mueller Sean Mathers just tell me what to say no matters if it's right
What? 😃

Sean Mathers Sorry, I have work to do, lyrics to write, so I wish you all a good day, even those who did not like the write here, because after all I did not come to discuss, because I do not have to explain myself, Day, a good afternoon, and a good night.
Cristiano De Borba Pereira reply back pls
So where's your music ? Drop your sound cloud 😂

Cristiano i believe in you mate coz i know the struggle. You can send me your lyrics , i'll try to make a rap song out of it. But if you have faith that you have a talent all it needs is a lil struggle :)
Mike Mueller thats not how it works, he wont do that, its gotta be a secret, cause it might get stolen
Stan
Zeeshan u inglush mester sed riactin nerd
